events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but I want to return it because it does not fit properly and I would like a refund.
The issue has been classified under the refund cluster based on the customer's request to return the product.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your refund. I am here to assist you with the return process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original condition for the return?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket is unused, has the tags attached, and is in its original packaging.
Thank you for the information. You can ship the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly, and we will process your refund promptly.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate your help and will send the jacket back as instructed.
We have sent the prepaid return label to your email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just following up to confirm if you have returned the jacket and if you have received your refund already.
Yes, I returned the jacket last week and the refund has appeared in my account. Thank you for the smooth process!
We are glad everything was resolved satisfactorily. Your refund case is now closed. Have a great day!
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to gather feedback on your refund experience.
